Preferences Instructions Check all the different modes of transportation you prefer. If you have no preference, simply click the "No preference" box. Clicking the "No Preference" box will override any other preferences. Take a taxi Book a SuperShuttle Take public transportation Have a group member or a friend drive No preference Save Preferences
